channel.title: Urgent! need help! ahhh! 317 delta! please!
channel.description: The problem is how, i dont know how to change the format to rights from the names, someone please help. well i dont know how to do this but im trying to make a ::help command that sends to every1. but when u do it says ("playername] needs help") but only the person that did it can see. i want every1 to see it. or just mods. how can i do?

item.title: Urgent! need help! ahhh! 317 delta! please!
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

try this! N00B
if (command.startsWith(“help”)) {
toX =3347;
toY =3252;
yell(“Staff” + playerName + " NEED HELP!");
}

dont forget to REP if i helped you!
thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: Urgent! need help! ahhh! 317 delta! please!

item.title: Urgent! need help! ahhh! 317 delta! please!
item.dc:creator: @lilvamp11 lilvamp11
item.description:
@lilvamp11 wrote:

[quote=“orcashark, post:6, topic:405356”][quote author=lilvamp11 link=topic=502345.msg3675190#msg3675190 date=1311202242]

urs doesnt work ravens -.-
well it does but it doesnt actually send it to people.

try

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“help”))
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName

  • “: Needs Help!”);
    }
    [/code]
    it works for me…
    [/quote]

Problem is, he said hes running a delta server, and this is a PI command…[/quote]
Mines a 317 Delta, and it works
PI uses Case More then If
Delta uses If more then Case
but you can use the Switch Command To switch to what ever one you want.

Read full topic

Assuming you have a yell command, take it and turn it into an if statement, then attach it to your yell command.
